item.title: PDD
item.description: score:-11 Chances: The PDD Holdings, Inc. is strategically positioned to benefit from the growth of the digital economy in East Asia, particularly in China. Risks: The new ‘refund only’ policies introduced by Chinese e-commerce players could potentially impact the revenue and profitability of PDD Holdings, Inc.
